DOC.brief_summary: Assess burden disease associate RSV infection premature child outpatient setting .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective prospective study assess burden disease associate RSV infection , measured/determined rate outpatient medically attended LRI , emergency room visit hospitalization among preterm infant ( 32-≤36 wGA ) RSV season , medical/health consequence , measure wheeze event , infant 's first RSV season , May 2009 .
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent parent/guardian participate study Male female preterm infant 32≤36 wGA Infant ≤ 6month old time enrollment Parent/guardian ability willingness follow study protocol ( first RSV season ) require protocol Receipt RSV prophylactic agent : palivizumab , IGIV , motavizumab time prior enrollment Participation trial investigational RSV prophylaxis RSV therapeutic agent Presence BPD CHD ( surgically treat PDA , ASD VSD ) Condition limit life span 6 month less date enrollment
